Title: Casually Jotted Down Snack List
Text:
Feeling a bit tired of drinks? Ragunna's bars also offer a selection of delightful snacks to refresh your palate.
Unlike those drinks full of "codes," these are snacks are simple—and complimentary with drinks.

Snacks and Descriptions

*St. Domingo Chocolate
Smooth and rich, this chocolate teases your taste buds with the bittersweet harmony of orange jam and wine, leaving a lingering aftertaste.

*Earl Grey Cake
The black tea-infused base, combined with the refreshing scent of citrus, delivers a mellow flavor that lingers without a hint of bitterness.

*Wine-Soaked Cherry Sabayon
Ripe, crimson cherries bathed in a creamy blend of eggs and sweet wine, lightly caramelized for a smoky finish.
The dance of warm and cold, sweet and fresh, tipsy and revitalizing… an unforgettable harmony of flavors.

Thank you for your generosity and patronage.
